data.description: MPI bindings for the Perl Data Language
data.communities:
Has been discussed on the PDL mailings lists. Look at
    http://pdl.perl.org/maillists/index_en.html
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
PDL::Parallel::MPI is a modification of Parallel::MPI.
    Parallel::MPI allows one to move around perl's built in datatypes
    (numerical scalars, arrays, strings, etc). PDL::Parallel::MPI has
    the additional functionallity of allowing one to move PDL objects
    around. There are other modules planned within PDL::Parallel. See
    the PDL mailing list archives for more details.
